column5: It was on WFN a few years back.  A documentary style salt water show about marlin fishing, tiki bars and music. A young guy was the host/ narrator?  Something life????  It's been bugging me all morning!!?
Gillznfinz!!!  Finally out of my misery.
Don't you hate when that happens.
Did the host look like this?  http://www.news.com....v-1226807230221
Ha ha! That's the guy Nailed it.
